text: Daniil Sergeyevich Medvedev (; born 11 February 1996) is a Russian professional tennis player. He is currently ranked by the Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP) as world No. 3. He has won 20 ATP Tour singles titles, including the 2021 US Open. Medvedev was born in Moscow. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Russian tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Moscow
title: Daniil Medvedev
